description: Bring some international flair to the table with this Tuscan-inspired potato soup. Creamy and silky, the humble spud never tasted so fancy.
name: Tuscan-Inspired Potato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Italian-style pork & fennel sausages, casings removed
1 rindless middle bacon rasher, roughly chopped
500g potatoes brushed, peeled, washed, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Cook sausage mince for 5 minutes, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, or until browned. Add bacon, onion and garlic, then cook for 5 minutes, stirring, or until onion has softened.

Add potato, stock and cream, then bring to the boil. Boil, uncovered, for 12 minutes or until potato is tender. Using potato masher or back of a large spoon, roughly mash potato until soup has thickened slightly. Season.
Stir in power greens and half of the parmesan until greens have wilted. Ladle soup into bowls and season with pepper. Serve topped with remaining parmesan.
